long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A simple extension that removes the disablepictureinpicture attribute from all <video> elements in a page, enabling the default Chrome's built-in Picture-in-Picture feature. 

Just click the icon, or hit the keyboard shortcut (defaults to Ctrl+Shift+P or Cmd+Shift+P if on mac) and the magic happens.
